resetYourPassword: Setha kabusha iphasiwedi yakho ye-akhawunti yakho ye-chancellorminus.com.
languageDescription: Okuqukethwe kwesayithi nokusebenzisana kwe-AI kuzosebenzisa ulimi oluthandayo.
noEmailAddress: Alikho ikheli le-imeyili elitholakele lale akhawunti.
checkYourInbox: Sicela uhlole ibhokisi lakho lokungenayo ukuze uthole imiyalelo yokusetha kabusha iphasiwedi yakho.
iChancellorWelcome: Sawubona, ngingu-iChancellor. Ngilapha ukukusekela endleleni yakho yokuphila kahle. Ngingakusiza ngani namuhla? Singaxoxa ngokucabangisisa, imikhuba enempilo, noma siqale ukuzindla okuqondisiwe.
pageTitle: Chancellor Minus | Usomabhizinisi, Unjiniyela we-AI & Umthuthukisi Ogcwele
pageDescription: Iphothifoliyo ephelele esebenza nge-AI ekhombisa amaphrojekthi namakhono kaChancellor Minus.
landingTitle: Ikusasa Lokuthuthukiswa Kwe-AI Yobunxusa Nokuzala — Namuhla
landingSubtitle: Chancellor Minus | Usomabhizinisi, Unjiniyela we-AI & Umthuthukisi Ogcwele
landingSearchPlaceholder: Sesha amaphrojekthi... isb. 'Hlola amaphrojekthi e-AI nokuqamba okusha kaChancellor'
noProjectsFound: Awekho amaphrojekthi atholakele we '{searchQuery}'. Zama ukusesha okuhlukile.
ctaDescription: Bhalisela i-akhawunti ukuze ufinyelele 'Impilo Enempilo' — umnyango wakho oya ezimisweni zokuzindla eziqondisiwe, ukusekelwa kwempilo komuntu siqu nge-iChancellor – umsizi wakho wezempilo we-AI, nokufinyelela okukhethekile kuJenaretha Yokuqonda Ngobuchwepheshe ukuze uthole imibono emisha kwezobuchwepheshe nokuphila kahle.
adminDescription: Phatha abasebenzisi, buka umsebenzi, futhi uqaphe uhlelo lokusebenza.
reportingDescription: Khiqiza imibiko mayelana nokuzibandakanya komsebenzisi nempilo yesistimu. (Kuyeza Maduze)
affirmationsDescription: Khiqiza isiqinisekiso esihle ukuze sikukhuthaze futhi sikugqugquzele ohambweni lwakho lokukhula komuntu siqu.
affirmationsInitialText: Chofoza inkinobho ukuze ukhiqize isiqinisekiso bese uqala uhambo lwakho.
affirmationError: Kube khona iphutha ngenkathi kukhiqizwa isiqinisekiso. Sicela uzame futhi.
aiAssistantTitle: Kusuka Kumqondo We-AI Kuya Eqinisweni Lokukhiqiza
aiAssistantDescription: Ngakhela, ngakha, futhi ngandisa izixazululo ze-AI ezihlakaniphile ezixazulula izinselelo zebhizinisi eziyinkimbinkimbi.
dashboardWelcome: Siyakwamukela, {name}! Khetha isihloko ukuze uthole ukuqonda kwakamuva okusebenza nge-AI.
techInsightDescription: Khetha isihloko bese uvumela umhlaziyi we-AI akunike isifinyezo namathiphu.
insightPlaceholder: Ukuqonda kwakho okukhiqizwe yi-AI kuzovela lapha.
loginDescription: Faka imininingwane yakho ukuze ufinyelele ideshibhodi yakho.
venturesDescription: Umbukiso wezinkampani nemikhiqizo esebenza nge-AI engiyakhile.
createAccountAndVerify: I-akhawunti yakho idaliwe! Sicela uhlole i-imeyili yakho ukuze uqinisekise i-akhawunti yakho.
aiAssistantWelcome: Sawubona! Ngingumsizi we-AI kaChancellor. Ngibuze noma yini ngamakhono nesipiliyoni sakhe.
auditLogsDescription: Landelela imicimbi nezenzo ezibalulekile kuhlelo lokusebenza lonke.
caseStudyDescription: Lolu cwaningo lwecala lobuchwepheshe lwakhiqizwa ngumsizi we-AI.
contactDescription: Unombuzo noma ufuna ukusebenzisana? Ngithumele umlayezo.
healthyLivingDescription: Umlingani wakho ekucabangisiseni, empilweni, nasekukhuleni komuntu siqu.
skillsDescription: Ukubuka ubuchwepheshe engisebenza nabo ukuze ngiphilise imibono, kusukela ku-frontend kuya ekusatshalalisweni.
transcriberDescription: Rekhoda noma layisha umsindo ukuze uwubhale phansi usebenzisa i-Whisper ye-OpenAI.
noAudioDescription: Sicela urekhode noma ulayishe ifayela lomsindo kuqala.
